meanings.definition: A breed of large hunting dogs, typically used for pursuing deer.
meanings.sent1: The staghounds swiftly chased after the deer in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The staghounds were trained to track down deer in the wilderness.
meanings.sent3: The staghounds playfully bounded through the woods, pretending to hunt deer.
meanings.sent4: The staghounds were like graceful dancers as they pursued the deer through the meadow.
meanings.sent5: The image of the staghounds racing after the deer was etched in his memory.

meanings.definition: A pack of staghounds used for hunting.
meanings.sent1: The hunters released the staghounds to track down the elusive deer.
meanings.sent2: The staghounds howled in unison as they followed the scent of the deer.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous staghounds decided to chase each other instead of the deer.
meanings.sent4: The staghounds moved as one, a relentless force in pursuit of their prey.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the staghounds on the hunt was both thrilling and awe-inspiring.
